entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 11.

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023
